asleep.description: Felix stayed home sick with a fever on Friday. He loved -- too much -- being home alone with Lucie. He was good about letting her work most of the time. He took a nap curled up on the couch right next to Lucie's desk.
asleep.title: Asleep

brothers1.description: Felix likes being a big brother.
brothers1.title: Brothers 1

brothers2.description: This is funny to us because Felix hardly ever put his own shoes on by himself.
brothers2.title: Brothers 2

brothers3.description: 'Tis the season to bake gingerbread cookies! The recipe for fraternal harmony:  Milo spoons the flour. Felix sifts. They both get a turn stirring.
brothers3.title: Brothers 3

discoverymuseum1.description: Big chunka wood at Bay Area Discovery Museum in Sausalito.
discoverymuseum1.title: Discoverymuseum 1

discoverymuseum2.description: All aboard the H.M.S. Felix Zed!
discoverymuseum2.title: Discoverymuseum 2

discoverymuseum4.description: Sausalito is right across the Golden Gate Bridge from San Francisco.
discoverymuseum4.title: Discoverymuseum 4

discoverymuseum5.description: When these two manly rescue boats rolled in with their manly rescue guys and their manly rescue gear, we mainly had to rescue Felix from hyperventilating.
discoverymuseum5.title: Discoverymuseum 5

owen.description: Owen loves woodshop just as much as Felix. Every Monday they come home with new projects. There's a remarkable lack of accidents despite using real tools.
owen.title: Owen

sillystring.description: Owen, Felix and the silly string we forgot to use during the birthday party.
sillystring.title: Sillystring

twins1.description: Leslie and Sasha Pave came over for brunch with their 6 month old twins, Owen and Isaac.
twins1.title: Twins 1

twins2.description: Owen (left) and Isaac (right) are supposed to be fraternal twins.  However, they look so much alike that Leslie and Sasha suspect they are identical. They are currently awaiting the results of a genetic test.
twins2.title: Twins 2

twins3.description: Felix and Milo were very excited to have babies over. They prepared a play area for them filled with their old baby toys.
twins3.title: Twins 3

twins5.description: Owen, tickled into hysteria by Moses.
twins5.title: Twins 5

description:
Felix has been going to an educational therapist for the last two months to work on his pre-reading skills. We thought that actual reading was a year or more away. So it came to an utter surprise that in this week's session Felix read his first words! He very carefully sounded out the following:
  1. on
  2. in
  3. if
  4. sof (An unintentional nonsense word -- the letters just happened to be there and Felix read them.)
He's very, very proud of himself and so are we!

The stats from Felix's five year old checkup:

  • 47 lbs (21.3 kg)
  • 43 3/4 inches (111 cm)

Milo's last three baby teeth are coming in simultaneously. It's making him cantankerous at times. In between the bouts of unreasonableness, though, he's being a joy with new verbal dexterity. He loves singing and his repertoire is expanding by the day. If he can't actually pronounce a word yet, by golly he'll say the closest thing he can and plow on with the song. It's adorable!
title: December 17
